name: Playablepiano
body:
This is a fork of playable piano, originally created by MacDGuy.

### Credits  
- MacDGuy for creating the original addon  
- FPtje for MIDI module and PR to playable piano  
- jackson-c & Python1320 for misc fixes  

### Enabling MIDI support  
See installation instructions for the MIDI module at https://github.com/FPtje/gmcl_midi#download  
Once you have installed the module, rejoin the server to activate the module.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
